mapper.insert:
insert into rcs_standard_sport_market_sell (match_info_id, match_manage_id, sport_id, tournament_id, tournament_name_cn, tournament_name_en, team_home_id, team_home_name_cn, team_home_name_en, team_away_id, team_away_name_cn, team_away_name_en, pre_match_time, live_odd_time, begin_time, pre_trader_id, pre_trader, pre_trader_status, live_trader_id, live_trader, live_trader_status, auditor_id, auditor, auditor_status, business_event, pre_match_sell_status, live_match_sell_status, video, animation, `status`, create_time, modify_time) values
(#{item.matchInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.matchManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sportId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.tournamentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.tournamentNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tournamentNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.teamHomeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.teamHomeNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.teamHomeNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.teamAwayId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.teamAwayNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.teamAwayNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.preMatchTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.liveOddTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.beginTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.preTraderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.preTrader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.preTraderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.liveTraderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.liveTrader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.liveTraderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.businessEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.preMatchSellStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.liveMatchSellStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.animation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into rcs_standard_sport_market_sell
id, match_info_id, match_manage_id, sport_id, tournament_id, tournament_name_cn, tournament_name_en, team_home_id, team_home_name_cn, team_home_name_en, team_away_id, team_away_name_cn, team_away_name_en, pre_match_time, live_odd_time, begin_time, pre_trader_id, pre_trader, pre_trader_status, live_trader_id, live_trader, live_trader_status, auditor_id, auditor, auditor_status, business_event, pre_match_sell_status, live_match_sell_status, video, animation, `status`, create_time, modify_time, pre_risk_manager_code, live_risk_manager_code, pre_match_data_provider_code, live_match_data_provider_code,
values
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{matchInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{matchManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sportId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tournamentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tournamentNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tournamentNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamHomeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teamHomeNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamHomeNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamAwayId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teamAwayNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamAwayNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preMatchTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{liveOddTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{preTraderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{preTrader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preTraderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveTraderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{liveTrader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveTraderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preMatchSellStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveMatchSellStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{animation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{preRiskManagerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveRiskManagerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preMatchDataProviderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveMatchDataProviderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
on duplicate key update
match_info_id = VALUES (match_info_id), match_manage_id = VALUES (match_manage_id), sport_id = VALUES (sport_id), tournament_id = VALUES (tournament_id), tournament_name_cn = VALUES (tournament_name_cn), tournament_name_en = VALUES (tournament_name_en), team_home_id = VALUES (team_home_id), team_home_name_cn = VALUES (team_home_name_cn), team_home_name_en = VALUES (team_home_name_en), team_away_id = VALUES (team_away_id), team_away_name_cn = VALUES (team_away_name_cn), team_away_name_en = VALUES (team_away_name_en), pre_match_time = VALUES (pre_match_time), live_odd_time = VALUES (live_odd_time), begin_time = VALUES (begin_time), pre_trader_id = VALUES (pre_trader_id), pre_trader = VALUES (pre_trader), pre_trader_status = VALUES (pre_trader_status) , live_trader_id = VALUES (live_trader_id), live_trader = VALUES (live_trader), live_trader_status = VALUES (live_trader_status), auditor_id = VALUES (auditor_id), auditor = VALUES (auditor), auditor_status = VALUES (auditor_status), business_event = VALUES (business_event), pre_match_sell_status = VALUES (pre_match_sell_status), live_match_sell_status = VALUES (live_match_sell_status), video = VALUES (video), animation = VALUES (animation), `status` = VALUES (`status`), modify_time = VALUES (modify_time), pre_risk_manager_code = VALUES (pre_risk_manager_code), live_risk_manager_code = VALUES (live_risk_manager_code), pre_match_data_provider_code = VALUES (pre_match_data_provider_code), live_match_data_provider_code = VALUES (live_match_data_provider_code),
mapper.select:
SELECT sell.id, sell.sport_id, sell.match_info_id, sell.tournament_name_cn, sell.tournament_name_en, IFNULL(matchinfo.begin_time,sell.begin_time) begin_time, matchinfo.match_status, matchinfo.match_period_id, matchinfo.data_source_code, sell.team_home_name_cn, sell.team_home_name_en, statistics.score, sell.team_away_name_cn, sell.team_away_name_en, sell.neutral_ground, sell.match_manage_id, sell.live_odd_business, sell.pre_trader, sell.pre_match_sell_status, sell.live_trader, sell.live_match_sell_status, sell.pre_match_time, sell.live_odd_time, sell.market_count, sell.corner_show, sell.card_show, sell.pre_match_data_provider_code, sell.live_match_data_provider_code FROM rcs_standard_sport_market_sell sell LEFT JOIN standard_match_info matchinfo ON sell.match_info_id = matchinfo.id LEFT JOIN match_statistics_info statistics ON sell.match_info_id = statistics.standard_match_id LEFT JOIN standard_sport_tournament tour ON matchinfo.standard_tournament_id = tour.id WHERE (sell.pre_trader!='' or sell.live_trader!='') AND sell.sport_id = #{standardMarketSellQueryVo.sportId} and sell.is_delete = 0
AND sell.match_info_id = #{standardMarketSellQueryVo.matchInfoId}
and matchinfo.begin_time >= #{standardMarketSellQueryVo.beginTimeMillis,jdbcType=BIGINT} and matchinfo.begin_time <= #{standardMarketSellQueryVo.endTimeMillis,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND (matchinfo.match_status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 9) or UNIX_TIMESTAMP() * 1000 > matchinfo.begin_time + ( 4 * 60 * 60 * 1000 ))
AND ((matchinfo.match_status NOT IN ( 3, 4, 5, 6, 9 ) or matchinfo.match_status is null) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() * 1000 < matchinfo.begin_time + ( 4 * 60 * 60 * 1000 ))
AND matchinfo.match_status = #{standardMarketSellQueryVo.matchStatus}
AND (sell.pre_match_sell_status IN ( 'Sold', 'Stop_Sold' ) OR sell.live_match_sell_status IN ( 'Sold','Stop_Sold'))
AND (sell.pre_match_sell_status NOT IN ( 'Sold', 'Stop_Sold' ) OR sell.live_match_sell_status NOT IN ('Sold', 'Stop_Sold'))
AND sell.pre_trader = ''
AND sell.live_trader = ''
AND (sell.pre_trader=#{standardMarketSellQueryVo.operatorInfo} or sell.live_trader=#{standardMarketSellQueryVo.operatorInfo})
order by matchinfo.begin_time,tour.tournament_level
order by tour.tournament_level,matchinfo.begin_time

SELECT sell.sport_id, count( 1 ) number FROM rcs_standard_sport_market_sell sell LEFT JOIN standard_match_info matchinfo ON sell.match_info_id = matchinfo.id WHERE (sell.pre_match_sell_status='Sold' OR sell.live_match_sell_status='Sold' ) AND (( matchinfo.match_status NOT IN ( 3, 4, 5, 6, 9 ) OR matchinfo.match_status IS NULL ) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP() * 1000 < sell.begin_time + ( 4 * 60 * 60 * 1000 )) and sell.begin_time >= #{beginTimeMillis} and sell.begin_time <= #{endTimeMillis} GROUP BY sell.sport_id
